page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: The area covered by reference number 04040417 is on the boundary of Yorkshire and Lancashire, but is in West Yorkshire. The area is in a Green Belt and is known locally as the Black Brook Valley. It is a very hilly area close to the M62. This survey was compiled by Bowling Green School. As the area is rural and there are few bus routes we explored on foot or by bike. We divided our area into 12 sections and took a small group of children to each one. We gave each section a grid reference and name:-{Ripponden Bank {0419,Barkisland 0519,Branch Road 0619 {Stainland 0719, Ringstone Edge {0418,Krumlin 0518,Stainland Dean {0618,Sowood 0718, Withens End {0417,Scammonden Road 0517,Broom Hill {0617,Marsden Gate 0717. }
